page.title: 11UNIVERSITY OF DUNDEE.
page.content: Originally called{Queen's College,a part of the{University of St.Andrews, {Dundee University}was granted its {Royal Charter}in 1967.It has faculties of medicine and dentistry, science, law, engineering and applied science, art and social sciences and environ- mental studies. There are places for{3,600 students and{450 academic staff.}35% of students are from England. The campus is near the centre of the town which brings harmony to 'town and gown' The University is in the forefront of research of medicine and science related to local industry particularly microelectronics,laser and genetics. Past notable staff and students include{Watson Watt}(Radar),{Patrick {Geddes}(Father of Town Planning), {D'Arcy Thomas}(Biologist) and{Malcolm {Longeir}(Astronomer).
